attributes.action: vote for no confidence for Boris
attributes.additional_details: Boris’s actions towards the ‘covid-19’ situation is beyond ridiculous. He Claims to be trying to keep the country safe yet remains to keep open schools/colleges/ gyms but closing other establishments such as restaurants/pubs and wants families separated again. Schools and colleges have a high rate of people there in one place but won’t allow you to see anymore than 6 people within your home or public place. This is my eyes makes no sense. This why I believe we need a new prime minister.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to take into consideration of getting the uk getting a new prime minister. Our current prime minister has put the country into recession with his poor money choices and putting fundings into the wrong people’s pockets.

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or to resign, or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could sign or start a petition about that.
